overview: Are you tired of X-rated chick flicks where surgically enhanced broads in cheerleading outfits masquerade as teenagers? Wanna see how real girls do it? Check out Barely Legal 5. This awesome collection delivers a banquet of tasty just-legal hotties from rustic nymphos to city-slick brats.
tagline: Tight, Wet Teens, old enough to know better but too young to care.
title: Barely Legal 5
